heroSection.title: Business Professional & Tech Enthusiast
heroSection.description: Transforming business operations through technology. Specializing in self-hosting, code development, data analtics and engineering, and automation solutions.

aboutMeSections.title: Technology Enthusiast
aboutMeSections.text: Passionate about exploring new technologies and building through business improvements, personal projects, and continuous learning.

aboutMeSections.title: Business Background
aboutMeSections.text: Small business owner with experience in operations, strategy.

aboutMeSections.title: Problem Solver
aboutMeSections.text: Combine technical skills with business acumen to create innovative solutions to complex problems.

aboutMeContent:
As a small business owner with a deep passion for technology, I've spent years developing my technical skills through hands-on projects, self-hosting, and automating business processes. I've built a homelab environment where I experiment with various technologies and continuously expand my knowledge.

My unique combination of business experience and technical skills allows me to bridge the gap between business needs and technical implementation. I'm now looking to leverage these skills in a technology role where I can make a bigger impact and continue growing professionally.
